title: Military style font ?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022055533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2page_title_1a_6581.gif)

Need help in finding out what the name of this font is. Thanks!
author: travistaylor

comments.content: sorry, but the small sample is not helping me a lot. could be something akin to [Superstar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022055533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/superstar/), but with the outlining removed. someone is sure to find a closer answer.
YES! I think you are correct. ITC Machine is it... or close enough. Thank you!!! :D
